title: Amy Receives Letter From Son’s Teacher + Jana Kramer Addresses ‘Hot Nanny’ Backlash
itunes:title: Amy Receives Letter From Son’s Teacher + Jana Kramer Addresses ‘Hot Nanny’ Backlash
description:
Amy talks about the letter she received from her son’s teacher about his behavior in class. Also, Jana Kramer calls in to address the backlash she’s gotten on her ‘hot nanny’ comments.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
